#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int ans[200007],a[200007];
int func(int x,int n)
{
	int i;
	for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
	{
	    ans[i]=0;
		if(x>=a[i])
		{
			ans[i]=(x/a[i]);
			x=x%a[i];
		}
		if(ans[i]!=0)
		{
			double temp = a[i]/100.0;
			if(a[i]%100 == 0)
			cout<<(int)a[i]/100<<" "<<ans[i]<<"\n";
			else
			{
				cout.precision(2);	
				cout<<fixed<<temp<<" ";
				cout<<ans[i]<<"\n";
			}			
		}
	}
	return 0;
}

int main()
{
	int t,n,m,i,var,k,kk;
	double d;
	cin>>t;
	for(k=1;k<=t;k++)
	{
		cin>>n>>m;
		cout<<"Case "<<k<<":\n";
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>d;
			a[i]=(d*100.0 + 1e-5);
			
		}
		sort(a,a+n);
		/*for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cout<<a[i]<<" ";
		cout<<"\n";*/
		for(kk=1;kk<=m;kk++)
		{
			cout<<"Scenario "<<kk<<":\n";
			cin>>d;
			var=(d*100.0+1e-5);
			//cout<<var<<"\n";
			func(var,n);
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
